backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the Farmer eKYC backend with agent management, farmer application submission, OTP-based manager authentication, and access control using a mixin authorization pattern.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: restoring the earthy green and warm amber color palette across all frontend pages, and updating CSS/Tailwind config with vivid OKLCH/HSL color tokens.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and key implementation details, serving as a reference for the frontend codebase structure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property color tokens for light and dark modes, including primary, accent, destructive, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router using TanStack Router, defining all routes for agent and manager flows with session-based authentication guards that redirect unauthenticated users to the appropriate login pages.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Shared authenticated page layout featuring a sticky earthy-green header with an amber logo icon, user role badge, logout button, optional page title bar, and a branded footer.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Small presentational component rendering a colored pill badge for application/agent statuses (pending, approved, rejected) using amber, emerald, and red Tailwind styles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) access, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider component, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating agent and farmer eKYC application data against the ICP backend actor, including queries for listing agents/applications and mutations for registration, login, and status updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines a custom earthy green and warm amber design token palette for both light and dark modes using CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/lib/auth.ts: Session management utilities for agents and managers, providing functions to save, retrieve, and clear sessions from sessionStorage, plus simple password hashing and agent ID generation helpers.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions including a Tailwind class merger (`cn`), and date/datetime formatters that handle both bigint nanosecond timestamps and numeric millisecond timestamps.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with React Query's QueryClientProvider and the InternetIdentityProvider.
Page displayed after a farmer eKYC application is submitted, showing the acknowledgment number with copy functionality and navigation buttons to submit a new application or check status.
frontend/src/pages/AgentApproval.tsx: Manager page for reviewing and approving or rejecting registered agents, featuring a searchable list of agents with their current status and action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/AgentDashboard.tsx: Renders the agent dashboard with a welcome banner showing the agent's session info and quick-action cards for submitting eKYC applications and checking application status.
frontend/src/pages/AgentLogin.tsx: Provides a two-tab login form for agents to authenticate via Agent ID + OTP or phone + password, saving the session and redirecting to the dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/AgentSignup.tsx: Handles new agent self-registration by collecting name, contact, and password, generating an agent ID, hashing the password, and displaying the generated ID for the agent to save.
frontend/src/pages/CheckApplicationStatu: Allows agents to look up a farmer eKYC application by its 14-digit acknowledgment number and displays the application details along with its approval status badge.
frontend/src/pages/CreateAgentAccount.ts: Lets managers create pre-approved agent accounts by entering agent details, then displays the generated Agent ID with a copy button for sharing with the new agent.
frontend/src/pages/FarmerApplicationAppr: Manager page for reviewing and approving/rejecting farmer eKYC applications, with search filtering and expandable application details.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Manager dashboard displaying overview stats (agents, applications, pending counts) and navigation cards to agent approval, application approval, and agent creation pages.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerLogin.tsx: Two-step manager login page that requests an OTP via email and verifies it to establish a manager session.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitFarmerEKYC.tsx: Agent-facing form page for submitting a new farmer eKYC application with fields for personal and document details, redirecting to an acknowledgment page on success.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and hash cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with CSS-variable-based colors, custom fonts (Inter/Poppins), border radii, box shadows, and animation/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 23) for the Farmer EKYC app, including architecture notes, known issues, and a list of all existing and planned features with their IDs, titles, requirement references, and versions.
